betterquesting:10.desc:8:
In this modpack, AE2 has been changed in order to fit in more with NTM. Many components have been changed to include NTM materials and some machines, like the Grinder and Inscriber, have had their functions moved to the Shredder and Press. The Meteors have also been removed, but skystone can still be crafted for building purposes.

This Chapter of the quests has its information derived from the FTB Wiki. If anything else is missing from the quest book, please visit the wiki.
